entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SpawnBrowserAsync #107771
    10.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessWaitingTests.MultipleProcesses_ParallelStartKillWait timeout #107765
  • [9.0] System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamConformanceTests.ConcurrentBidirectionalReadsWrites_Success is hanging #107762
    9.0.0
  • System.Net.Quic tests timeout #107761
  • Using a default method on an interface to implement a static virtual interface method leads to memory corruption #107754
  • [browser] JSSynchronizationContext.Pump: Unexpected failure (ManagedThreadId #107752
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Flowgraph Modernization and Improved Block Layout in .NET 10 #107749
    10.0.0
  • .NET 9 RC 1 publish failed for WebAssembly AOT #107745
    10.0.0
  • [Wasm] Satellite assemblies for localization are not used #107742
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] unify Interop.GetHostName #107741
    10.0.0
  • [mono] Fix swift struct lowering support for `InlineArray` #107736
    10.0.0
  • ClientWebSocket ignoring custom SPN/UPN for Kerberos authentication #107733
    Future
  • JsonSerializer.Deserialize throws not expected ArgumentOutOfRangeException #107729
  • Error: [MONO] * Assertion at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/metadata/assembly.c:1673, condition `<disabled>' not met #107730
    8.0.x
  • Possible regression with [ThreadStatic] in debug builds on .NET 9 RC1 #107728
  • Test failure: JIT/Stress/ABI/tailcalls_do/tailcalls_do.cmd #107727
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Native AOT Binaries still depend on libz.so #106566
    9.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests fails with assertion in mini-ppc.c on ppc64le #97296
    Future
  • Failing test cases System.IO.FileSystem #107636
    10.0.0
  • Document to explain what each FEATURE_XXXX is #7347
  • Quick Start Guide for New Contributors Guide #31146
  • Fuzzlyn: Assertion failed '!fgIsCommaThrow(morphedTree)' during 'Morph - Global' #107544
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.CacheTests.JsonSerializerOptionsUpdateHandler_ClearingDoesntPreventSerialization #107589
    9.0.0
  • [Wasm] Support for the mono log profiler for memory profiling #107312
    9.0.0
  • Exception thrown in GC callback while walking native object wrappers on AOT #104582
    10.0.0
  • Remove unused predicate versions of instructions from API comments #107738
    9.0.0
  • JsonSerializer.Deserialize(ROS<byte>, JsonTypeInfo<T>>) hangs with AllowOutOfOrderMetadataProperties on Amazon Linux 2023 with native AoT #107740
  • Test failure: JIT/Directed/tailcall/mutual_recursion/mutual_recursion.cmd #106601
  • Make all compiled strings default utf8 #107720
  • Unnecessary outer loop in CountBy #106110
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add TryGetReadOnlySpan<T>() to CollectionsMarshal for ReadOnlyCollection<T> #106066
    Future
  • Potential (~5% chance) AccessViolationException in ReadyToRun executable targeting RID osx.11.0-arm64/osx.12-arm64 when running a child process for the first time, and both standard output and standard error are redirected #88288
  • Application crashes in release mode throwing System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException #100758
  • NTLM authentication not working in Linux based environment #101058
    9.0.0
  • [.NET 9.0 RC1] Inline Array's cannot be deserialized by System.Text.Json #107715

PullRequests

Created

  • Move tools to use LKG ILC #107772
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Move UseSystemZlib into SetupOSSpecificProps #107770
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression, 9.0.0
  • Restructure JSImport/JSExport generators to share more code and utilize more Microsoft.Interop.SourceGeneration shared code #107769
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, source-generator
  • Make `AppDomain::AssemblyIterator` iterate over `Assembly` instead of `DomainAssembly` #107768
    needs-area-label
  • Remove `DebuggerModule::Get/SetPrimaryModule` - always itself #107767
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT/ARM64] Generate frames compatible with Apple compact unwinding #107766
    arch-arm64, os-mac-os-x, area-CodeGen-coreclr, os-ios, os-tvos, community-contribution
  • Fix memory corruption bug in virtual static method dispatch #107763
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Remove redundant !fgIsCommaThrow(morphedTree) assert #107760
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Issue a deprecation warning for COMPlus_ prefix #107759
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Arm64/Sve: Remove entries of SVE APIs take 32-bit address #107758
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Profiler] Update GetFunctionInfo2 to have a decent default ClassID #107753
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/9.0][browser] Enable the log profiler #107747
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Fixed swift lowering support for inline arrays #107744
    area-VM-meta-mono, area-Interop-mono
  • Fix comments in AggregateException.GetBaseException() #107743
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • First-class Span #107737
    needs-area-label
  • [NRBF] Comments and bug fixes from security review #107735
    binaryformatter-migration, area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • Add some missing docs in System #107726
    area-Meta

Merged

  • [release/9.0] Bump to 8.0.10, 6.0.35 for downlevel #107702
    Servicing-approved, area-Workloads, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] [s390x] Use consistent shift instruction #107750
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • Move UseSystemZlib into SetupOSSpecificProps #107666
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [ppc64le] Fixed BinaryFormatter and Tensors tests #107678
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] Backport some PACKAGE.md files #107724
    Servicing-approved, area-Meta
  • Fixes hang in WinUI apps published to AOT #104583
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Fixes hang in WinUI apps published to AOT #107751
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix test bug in FileSystem.Tests #107696
    area-System.IO, 10.0.0
  • [JIT/ARM64] Fix few SP-based instruction encoding issues #107732
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove unused predicate instructions from API comments #107739
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [release/9.0] [DiagnosticSource] Add version event to EventSources used for out-of-proc monitoring #107748
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix heap corruption issue in PriorityQueue.Remove #107603
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Collections, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] TypeName fuzzer and bug fixes #107533
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • [release/9.0] Backport "Fix SVE ExtendWidening ConditionalSelect tests" (#107601) #107725
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] [Tar] Fill in the file size even if the file is empty. #107633
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Formats.Tar, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] [mono] Revert "don't define HAS_CUSTOM_BLOCKS on mono (#106764)" #107675
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Memory, 9.0.0
  • Remove redundant !fgIsCommaThrow(morphedTree) assert #107624
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [DiagnosticSource] Add version event to EventSources used for out-of-proc monitoring #107576
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Enable the log profiler #107434
    arch-wasm, community-contribution, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Remove ILCompiler package reference #107583
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Add missing `[RequiresDynamicCode]` attributes to System.Linq.Expressions API in ref assembly #107638
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • Work around F# ildasm/ilasm round-trip test failure #107692
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move load level tracking and checks from `DomainAssembly` to `Assembly` #107697
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] JIT ARM64-SVE: Backport "Avoid combining conditional select for reduction instrinsics" (#107207) #107722
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] [ILStrip] Fix passing assemblies using relative path #107548
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios
  • [release/9.0] [browser] Fix processing of satellite assemblies from referenced assembly during publish #107398
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [WASI] System.Net.NameResolution #107351
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [NRBF] More bug fixes #107682
    area-System.Formats.Nrbf

Updated

  • Doc updates for source-of-truth assemblies #107773
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Add managed Mac signing implementation #107378
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • JIT: Fix `emitter::emitSplit` to not create zero-sized method fragment #107568
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add feature switch to disable DataSet XML serialization #107713
    area-System.Data
  • Put brotli on the FetchContent plan #107166
    area-System.IO.Compression, 10.0.0
  • Add EventSource event method generation #107176
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • Arm: Free up upper-half register that was not ready because of its association with busy lower-half register #107714
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use merged runners for ios tests #107118
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use live apphost when publishing ilc as singlefile #105004
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix HashSet copy constructor handling of instances that have fallen back to the randomized hashcode generator. (#107613) #107687
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Collections, 8.0.10
  • [release/9.0] Fix HashSet copy constructor handling of instances that have fallen back to the randomized hashcode generator. (#107613) #107685
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Collections, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Revert "Avoid taking lock for empty bucket in ConcurrentDictionary.TryRemove …" #107656
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Collections, 8.0.10
  • Fix MaxWorkingSet_GetNotStarted_ThrowsInvalidOperationException #105424
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-freebsd, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • Remove static monitor helper functions #107667
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-area-label
  • [wasm] Process LinkerArg for wasm targets #107194
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, os-browser
  • Update to RC1 SDK #107673
    area-Infrastructure
  • GC test cleanup #107000
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [cdac] break up cdacreader into 4 separate assemblies #107709
    NO-MERGE, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Target .NET 10 / net10.0 #106599
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that AdvSimd.Insert doesn't zero out the upper bits #107091
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Use system brotli on Unix non-portable builds #107708
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] [mono] Fix swizzle_mask type #107602
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [release/9.0] [mono] Fix crash in emit_llvmonly_handler_start #107590
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Some System.Decimal performance improvements #99212
    area-System.Numerics
  • ARM64-SVE: refactor lsra buildHWIntrinsic #107459
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • UInt128 improve division by 64 bit on x64 #99747
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [WASI] sockets #106977
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Sockets, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Enable NuGet Audit and fix issues #107639
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove some implicit Helper Method Frames (HMF) #107648
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [cdac] Basic ISOSDacInterface::GetMethodDescData #106413
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • SunOS process and thread support #105403
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • [NRBF] Arrays of any records #107627
    area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • Check HFA alignment for valuetype fields #106099
    arch-arm32, arch-arm64, area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0][no-merge][testing][infra] Verify Apple mobile platforms on iOS 17 and XCode 15 #107021
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, os-tvos
  • Allow preinitializing spans created from arrays #107575
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Transfer arguments between calling conventions in shuffling thunks #107282
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • WebSocket Feedback Follow-up #107662
    area-System.Net
  • GC cleanup #105517
    area-GC-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-12
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • AOT LLVM - Issue migrating from 8 to 9 (bad wasm file version: 0x1000d (expected 0x1)) #2685

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Ilc failure in PHASE_EARLY_PROP #2683

PullRequests

Created

  • Add MachO to read symbols #2686

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/6.0.4xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #43390
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/6.0.1xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #43389
  • Binding redirects are not generated for transitive packages with version incremented with central package management transitive pinning #43388

Closed

  • vmr-pull-updates uses inline scripts instead of calling external scripts #43392
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/6.0.4xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #43112
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/6.0.1xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #43104
  • Could you please delete this issue? Thank you." #43387
  • Add a EventPipe test for a native AOT library #34839
    9.0.1xx
  • SDK 9.0 rc2 carries microsoft.net.sdk.aspire 9.0.0-preview4 which causes aspire workloads and templates to disappear. #43301
  • project.assets.json is not being updated when restoring #9476
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Use NuGetAudit property to condition NuGet source auditing #43397
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] .NET Source-Build 9.0.100-rc.1.24452.1 September 2024 Updates #43396
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Don't fail metadata updates on missing assemblies (#40725) #43393
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Hot Reload: Handle file deletions correctly #43368
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • Search version in set #43096
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix processing non-public classes and generic types in AssemblyScheduler.cs #43377
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix TestResultMessagesSerializer #43376
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Allow binlog in dotnet test #43286
    Area-DotNet Test
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #43366
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #43365
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add analyzer redirecting VSIX #42861
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge the net10 dotnet/runtime and dotnet/aspnetcore codeflows #43070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add PGO for F# compiler #42514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • .NET Source-Build 9.0.100-rc.1.24452.1 September 2024 Updates #43363
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix: Don't fail metadata updates on missing assemblies #40725
    untriaged
  • [VMR] Add support for join point vertical job in vmr-build.yml #43288
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Publish prebuilt reports for each repo #43336
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • AuthHandshakeMessageHandler: also try Basic auth when username is '<token>'. #43354
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `field` keyword nullability: short and long term solutions #8425

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update README.md #8426
  • Update the params proposal in line with the new betterness rules #8393

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Enable new xUnit analyzers #75093
  • Possibly unexpected error when a ref field is passed as an argument #75082
  • Pattern matching an enum using an enum value following by using "with expression" on a record causes a compilation error #75074
  • Semantic snippets: Inline statement snippets are not present if completion session is not triggered explicitly #75072

Closed

  • Stack overflow when compiling incorrectly formed attribute argument string #74677
    17.13
  • Incorrect System.Reflection.*Attributes checks in some parts of the code #16929
    Backlog
  • API: Analyzer redirecting #74989
  • Japanese Translation Issues in “Naming style" Sample. #75051
  • Incorrect nullability analysis #75017
  • API: `Conversion.IsSpan` #74738
  • constant string allow conversions #74369
  • Assert failure when building runtime: Stack not empty during emit. #75034
    17.12
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35311.136 #75064

PullRequests

Created

  • Exclude identifiers in attributes from identifier map #75100
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Suppress an assert when an indexer is declared, but DefaultMemberNameAttribute is missing. #75099
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [TEST] Test our publishing correctness CI task #75098
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2537263 #75097
    auto-merge
  • Remove some obsolete build properties #75096
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Issue 74872 #75094
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move some emit tests from Emit2 to Emit3 to avoid hitting UserString heap limit #75091
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge latest bits from 'main' branch into extensions branch #75090
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Test and document Span breaking changes #75079
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Merge `main` into `features/FirstClassSpan` #75077
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Disallow ref assignment to ternary or another ref assignment #75076
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix parser regressions of conditional expressions #75075
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Verify that semantic snippets obey IDE preferences #75073
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Keep try syntax in async exception rewriting #75070
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Async Streams, untriaged
  • Upgrade xUnit #75068
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Adjust an assert in EmitArgument #75067
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Adjust IsMetadataVirtual assertion in MethodToClassRewriter #75066
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Include initial filter node when searching for nodes to order modifiers #75092
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • BindAttributeCore - use proper binder to avoid an attribute binding cycle #75060
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove buggy IsPublic method from TypeAttributesExtensions #75081
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #75095
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Log messages for Test Results #75084
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Localize 17.12 branch #75088
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove additional Gitter link #75086
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #75087
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Lock translation of strings used to demonstrate identifier naming styles #75065
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #75045
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, VSCode
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #75080
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.10 #75071
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Fix stack adjustment when emitting stackalloc #75042
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.8 #75069
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move build and test to an newer Ubuntu image with longer support #74881
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Better Collection Expression Conversion From Expression #74993
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, New Feature - ParamsCollections, 17.12
  • Enable NuGet audit #75049
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Switch to new VMR control set #75056
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • SynthesizedHotReloadExceptionSymbol #74625
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, 17.12
  • Add analyzer redirecting API #74820
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Avoid duplicate synthesized interface members #73730
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • docs: Fix "Augment user code" example #75041
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove trimming tests workaround for runtime bug #57846
    9.0-rc2
  • Error: Failed to invoke 'JoinGroup' due to an error on the server #57845
  • Blazor different base path produces error #57843
  • MAUI .NET 8 app using Microsoft.Extensions.Localization 8.0.8 stuck in splash screen on Android #57842
  • Authentication: Support for OAuth 2.0 for Native Apps Flow in ASP.NET Core #57838
  • Use TimeProvider instead of DateTimeOffset in DataProtectionAPI #57833
  • Incorrect XML documentation for IUserAuthenticatorKeyStore #57832
    Backlog
  • Allow removal or alteration of framework-added metric tags. #57831
  • Perf regression: mvc #57829
  • clean up global event listener, when connection closed #57828
    .NET 10 Planning

Closed

  • MSIS7012 : The same client browser session has made '6' requests in the last '1' seconds. Contact your administrator for details #57810
  • Blazor Server Side: await Task.Delay needed in order to get UI to refresh #57781
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #57796
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware, updates #57813
  • Produce NuGet package READMEs #57729
    9.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • Unquarantine AcceptNewStreamsDuringClosingConnection #57848
    area-networking
  • Unquarantine StreamPool_StreamIsInvalidState_DontReturnedToPool #57847
    area-networking
  • [Templates] Fix template scripts, make them more flexible and robust #57841
    area-mvc
  • Fix `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Diagnostics.EntityFrameworkCore` package README #57840
    area-middleware
  • Fix parameter description in GetAuthenticatorKeyAsync #57834
    area-identity, community-contribution

Merged

  • [Identity][Templates] Ensure placeholders don't overlap with text #57783
    area-mvc, 10.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #57836
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Http.Sys: Clean up Request parsing errors #57531
    Servicing-approved, area-networking, 9.0-rc2
  • Provide `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.AzureAppServices` package README #57824
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection.EntityFrameworkCore` package README #57823
    area-dataprotection, 10.0-preview1
  • Provide `Microsoft.Authentication.WebAssembly.Msal` package README #57818
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview1
  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.SignalR.Client.Core` package README #57817
    area-signalr, 10.0-preview1
  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Certificate` package README #57811
    area-security, 10.0-preview1
  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.JsonPatch` package README #57792
    area-mvc, 10.0-preview1
  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.TestHost` package README #57790
    area-hosting, 10.0-preview1
  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Facebook` package README #57786
    area-security, 10.0-preview1
  • Provide `Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.StackExchangeRedis` package README #57785
    feature-caching, 10.0-preview1
  • [release/9.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `ff233bd` to `0953a17` #57643
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-rc2
  • HybridCache: relocate to dotnet/extensions #57670
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-rc2
  • Bump webpack from 5.93.0 to 5.94.0 #57592

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • iOS Buttons without enough padding are truncated in certain scenarios #24746
    .NET 8 SR9
  • [Android] Apps compiled for 15.0 / 35 default displaying as Edge to Edge #24742
  • Unable to select tab after backing out of page and returning #24741
    Backlog
  • .NET 9: Runtime crashes when utilizing legacy libraries. #24740
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [iOS] Indicator view does not render properly at load time within the indicator template. #24739
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Notification Service Extension Not Working in TestFlight Release Build #24737
    Backlog
  • [Unstable][MAUI][NET8]Recipe names are truncated on recipe pages #24735
    Backlog
  • TapGestureRecognizer ButtonMask always return 0. #24734
    Backlog
  • [Android] Cannot open MainActivity via Intent when the app is in the background #24733
    Backlog
  • [Windows] System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException raised when changing the items source for Indicator view with DateTemplate #24732
    Backlog
  • Remove excessive API docs in comments #24731
    Backlog
  • Pack `HybridWebView` associated JS script as an embedded resource quite like `BlazorWebView` JS script #24730
    .NET 10 Planning

Closed

  • XAML error is shown when the content of a DataTemplate is not a View #22485
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [Essentials] Browser.OpenAsync with BrowserLaunchMode.SystemPreferred causes StackOverflowException in .NET for iOS app (non-MAUI app) #24720
    Backlog
  • MacCatalyst: Tooltips are not working properly #24671
  • Page Scrolls Up When Clicking Entry Positioned at Bottom #24723
  • UnauthorizedAccessException while accessing file using FileStream in Android #24346
  • Erro ao Criar um projeto com o .NET MUI APP #24291
  • Warnings when including a Converter in XAML #24736
  • Crash on startup with iOS Release #24618
    Backlog
  • Undefined symbols for architecture arm64 Error, while using Native libraries in MAUI iOS #24536
  • Talkback is not announcing Recipes as Headings: A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App Home Screen_Home Screen_Screen reader. #22968
    .NET 8 SR9
  • DeviceIdiom detects notebook as tablet #24596

PullRequests

Created

  • [HybridWebView] fix trimmer warnings on Android #24744
    area-controls-hybridwebview

Merged

  • Update to Version 8.0.99 #24728
  • 8.0.90 Release Branding #24727
  • Revert "[X] do not apply Bindings if DataType doesnt match (#22056)" #24693
    area-xaml

Updated

  • Add styling and Shell to Blazor Hybrid template #24253
    area-templates
  • Bump WinAppSDK to 1.6 #24266
    area-infrastructure
  • [testing] Fix CollectionView2 UITests #24471
    area-controls-collectionview, area-testing
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #24691
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • [Windows] Handle focus events using `FocusManager` (take 2) #24695
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-keyboard, t/perf
  • Improve measure invalidation and legacy Layout(s) performance #24532
    area-layout, community ✨
  • [Windows] Skip initial assignments in property mapper (take 3) #23987
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-core-platform
  • [Windows] Add `WindowsBatchPropertyMapper` to save unnecessary work when initializing views #24417
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-core-platform
  • [Windows] Handle focus events using `FocusManager` #24355
    community ✨, area-keyboard
  • Use newer default backup rules for android #24391
    platform/android 🤖, area-essentials
  • Investigating things for easier Aspire integration #24365
    area-core-hosting
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8 #24206
    area-infrastructure
  • Setting Background to null will update rendering on Android and iOS #24726
    area-theme
  • Improve keyboard scrolling with editors, contentInsets, and different keyboards #24589

  • [Localization] Remove check not allowing translations to run on net9.0 #24724

  • [X] Ignore Parent DataType on collection #24530

  • [iOS] Custom font icon is not rendered in a shell tabbar tab #24721

  • [X] don't expand types to Extension for x:Static #17276

  • Port all remaining Xamarin.UITest tests to Appium #24153

  • [Android] IndicatorView with DataTemplate (custom image) does not render correctly when ItemsSource change #24717

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Reusing Include Statements #34661
  • Cosmos: NullReferenceException when projecting out a collection of owned entity types #34660
    Backlog
  • SQL Server: bring vector search support into the provider #34659
    Backlog
  • EF Core 9 ConfigureDbContext and PooledDbContextFactory #34658

Closed

  • Terminating_AsAsyncEnumerable_on_DbSet test fails on MS.CA 4.10.0 #34665
  • Add support for IQueryable.Append translation #34657
  • Make sure we depend on a new SQLite version that supports .NET 9 WASM #34575
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] Update SDK to 9.0.100-rc.1.24452.12 #34669
    Servicing-approved, tell-mode
  • [release/9.0] Enable Central Package Management #34666
  • [release/9.0] Handle leaf entity projection in Cosmos #34662
    tell-mode

Merged

  • [release/9.0] Fix type mapping management for JsonScalarExpression #34663
    tell-mode
  • Fix doc typo #34664
  • [release/9.0] Change some JSON Metadata API to respect null values set explicitly. #34624
    Servicing-approved, tell-mode
  • Update SQLite libraries to new versions (with WASM on .NET 9 supported). #34576

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #34621
  • Enable NuGetAudit #34650
  • [release/8.0] Remove referencing indexes when reconfiguring a property as a navigation #34651
    Servicing-approved
